  • Constructor Details

    • FurnitureCategory

      public FurnitureCategory()
      Default constructor for the FurnitureCategory class. Initializes attributes with default values.

    • FurnitureCategory

      public FurnitureCategory(String id, String typeName, Double maximumLoad, boolean isOutdoor, ArrayList<String> materials)
      Constructs a new FurnitureCategory with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the furniture category.
      typeName - The name of the furniture category.
      maximumLoad - The maximum load the furniture can support in kilograms.
      isOutdoor - Indicates if the furniture is suitable for outdoor use.
      materials - The list of materials used in the furniture category.

      Gets the unique identifier of the furniture category.

      The unique identifier of the furniture category.

    • getMaxLoad

      public Double getMaxLoad()
      Gets the maximum load the furniture can support.
      Returns:
      The maximum load the furniture can support in kilograms.

    • getRoomRecommendation

      public String getRoomRecommendation()
      Gets the recommended room for placing the furniture.
      Returns:
      The recommended room for placing the furniture (e.g., "Living Room").

    • addMaterial

      public void addMaterial(String material)
      Adds a new material to the list of materials used in the furniture.
      Parameters:
      material - The material to be added.

    • isSuitableForOutdoor

      public boolean isSuitableForOutdoor()
      Checks if the furniture type is suitable for outdoor placement.
      Returns:
      True if the furniture type is suitable for outdoor use and can support more than 50 kilograms; false otherwise.

    • displayDetails

      public void displayDetails()
      Displays detailed information about the furniture category, including recent purchaser details if available.
